title: Toxic players gonna toxic.
body:
Enemy bot lane winning.

Shaco ganks a couple times and Kog starts to get fed.

Enemy bot lane starts to tilt a bit and make a couple bad plays. Kog is now really fed.

Enemy Rammus now in full buttmad mode.

Starts raging about how bad his bot lane is.

Tell him to stop acting like a dick. Get warning message after game telling me I was reported.

Have you ever been so mad that you reported people for telling you to stop being an asshole towards your teammates?
